channel.title: Checkbox or comments in visualizations
channel.description:
Dear all, it would be great to be able to have a column with checkboxes in queries visualization lists.
I have imported a query data into a google sheet so my team can checkbox everytime they solve each register but as the data refreshes the checkbox is not marking the proper query result anymore.
